title: minor blood moon thresh aesthetic problems (gameplay? i guess?)
body:
This isn't really a big thing so I don't really expect it to be fixed soon, but the blood moon thresh skin does have a few cosmetic things wrong with it.
1.) When you absorb a soul, thresh glows green instead of red almost all the time, idk if this is intentional or not.
2.) the attack animations seem to be glitched, as when I attack he twists and seems to attack thin air. But the attack still connects

Has anyone else encountered these?

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

The green souls is a known issue, and we're working on it! As for the attack animations, we'll take a look and see what's going on!

I get the attack animations and my q going through people.. If i had twitch and whatever tool people use to record games i'd show you but all the proof i have is a few friends who duo with me. As for the green souls, as far as i can tell thats a personal graphical bug it seems. I've had no issues what so ever. 

I DO HOWEVER GET VERY MAD AT AN ENEMY THRESH ON THE OPOSING TEAM WHILE I"M USING BLOOD MOON THRESH SKIN. WHEN SOULS DROP FOR EITHER OF US, NEITHER ONE OF US CAN TELLS WHO"S SOULS ARE WHO'S DUE TO IT BEING BOTH RED FOR THE SKIN AND FOR THE ENEMY.

Had to make sure someone saw that.

Also, picking up souls causes thresh's walking animation to totally glitch out. It's bad enough to say i can't exactly describe it. It just looks wrong in too many ways.

hmm, never had the walking animation glitch. But that thing about the same color souls I've had to deal with plenty of times. Half the time I think their thresh is stealing my souls.
I used to have the attack animation glitch all the time, back when I first picked up thresh from the store. I haven't supported in awhile with him, so I didn't think it was still an issue.
Thanks, The attack animations glitch don't happen all the time, but when they do, its like the basic attack looks like it was canceled, but it actually wasn't. Happens to me quite a bit in game.
